title: Ok but has bug
comment: Like it for no unnecessary permissions. But screen rotation causes light to flash.
I published an update today (May 2015) that when rolled out by Google, should address this issue.

title: Doesn't work on first generation nexus 7

comment: Expect v4 update has fixed issues on newer Android version. Pls. retry if you like.
Expect v4 update has fixed issues on newer Android version. Pls. retry if you like.

title: Perfect Ad Free Torch/Flashlight app
comment: Advantages:  1. Ad free!  2. Tiny size  3. As simple to use as possible  Disadvantage:  Can't prevent your device from sleeping  Before finding this excellent application, I was almost frustrated. There is a ton of `free' torch/flashlight apps and all the ones I tried, including 3 the most popular ones, annoyed me with constantly changing ads. They also required tons of permissions and their size was 1+ Megabytes. I was puzzled: how on Earth can an app turning your camera's LED on and off weigh 3 Megabytes and require unlimited permission to use the network and many, many more permissions?  The answer is obvious: they need the permissions to download the ads and annoy you, and bloated size of the app is probably due to fancy images they contain.  This app (AB ITS Inc Flashlight Ad Free) is very different. No permissions are required other than what's needed to turn the LED on/off. The size is tiny (30 Kilobytes!). No ads.  You need to understand though a 30 KB app has to be very simple. No fancy graphics, no options.

title: Excellent!
comment: Ad free! Thank you! Works perfect!
Works great on Samsung Galaxy Android 2.3

title: Didn't work on Droid 4
comment: This was the perfect app. Free, lightweight, no ads. Too bad it didn't work on my D4.
